name: Ninja Volleyball HD
description:
Meant to be played against a friend!

--NOT A SINGLE PLAYER EXPERIENCE--

Play head to head with another player ( on the same keyboard locally ) in a game of volleyball...to the death! Every time you fail to knock the ball back you lose one balance beam. Land in the spikes and it's MATCH OVER!

Earn points with each successful volley and trade them in to unlock upgrades for your ninja! Controls in game, local 2-player only, single players will not enjoy this!

CONTROLS IN GAME
